checks.name: domain_does_not_use_internal_user_database
checks.title: Ensure that Amazon Elasticsearch/Opensearch Service domains do not user the internal user database
checks.risk: Internal User Database is convenient for demos; for production environment use Federated authentication.

remediation.text: Remove users from internal user database and uso Cognito instead.

checks.name: domains_is_not_publicly_accessible
checks.title: Ensure that Amazon Opensearch/Elasticsearch domains are not set as Public or have open policy access
checks.risk: Publicly accessible services could expose sensitive data to bad actors.

detect.resoto: is(aws_open_search_domain) and access_policies.Statement[*].{Effect=="Allow" and (Principal.AWS="*" or Principal="*") and (Condition==null or Condition.IpAddress.`aws:SourceIp`[] in ["*", "0.0.0.0/0"])}

remediation.text: Use  VPC endpoints for internal services.
